tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerInteractionLog (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    communication_log TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_type VARCHAR,
    log_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT NOT NULL,
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_interactions(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conduct_monitoring (
  conduct_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT NOT NULL,
  conduct_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  conduct_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  conduct_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_interactions(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(100),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE behavior_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    send_time TIMESTAMP
);
